title: Decent movie
review: This is an interesting storyline. I enjoyed it because I havnt seen a movie with a similar plot so it had me thinking. The acting is pretty good in particularly the main male lead and his family. This movie isnt the best I've ever seen but if you enjoy the thriller/horror genre like I do and often watch ones with terrible plots and questionable acting... This movie isn't like those and is worth a watch.

title: Intense physiological Thriller. Eye Catching
review: Intertwined web of secrets that keep you on your toes in this beautifully shot thriller. David Martin-Porras Directed this in the most Interesting dark way. Each Character delivers to the max! John Patrick Amedori was incredible to watch! Cool Movie!

title: well done...
review:
Well done story, had a good ending as well, great work by all the actors, all of them really played their part well...amazing direction as well..

a must see if you're a thriller / mystery movie fan.
